name: demitasse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small cup of coffee: He quickly drank what was left of his demitasse. The whole meal was perfect, including the demitasse.
(also demitasse cup) a small cup, used for serving coffee or soup: demitasse of Serve these little tarts with a demitasse of espresso. A demitasse of asparagus soup was served as an appetizer. Half fill a demitasse cup with sugar, then add strong espresso coffee.
